markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vine Arrow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=170)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [arrow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=83)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Leafy stalks protrude from the shaft of this rustic arrow. When an activated _vine arrow_ hits a target, the arrow’s shaft splits and grows, wrapping the target in vines. The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 2d4 rounds, or until it Escapes against a DC of 19. On a critical hit, the target is also immobilized until it Escapes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vine Arrow
